front.title: Introductory tutorial for DAD

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This report presents the introductory tutorials for the use of the software DAD_ESWL v1.0 capable of computing efficiently the response to wind of mid- and high-rise structures consisting of up to thousands of members.

seriesInfo.name: NIST technical note; NIST tech note; NIST TN
